content:
I can see the doc title ("PRD: AURA — The Zurich Discovery Engine (2026 Pilot)") but can't access the actual content—Google Docs sharing doesn't expose the text to web scrapers even when the link is public.

Two options:

**Quick:** Copy the full text and paste it here directly. I'll read it and we can talk through it.

**Clean:** Download it as a `.md` or `.txt` file and I'll save it to the workspace. That way it lives in the project context permanently.

Which do you prefer?
